caption.body: German filmmaker Sylvia Borges was inspired by choir rehearsals in an empty parking lot during the COVID-19 pandemic to produce a film that speaks to forced separation, but also to unity and resilience during these difficult times.  See “Particles” by Sylvia Borges in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security, in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 5:00am to 10:00pm, or online at: https://bit.ly/3HSTDI4
caption.excerpt: German filmmaker Sylvia Borges was inspired by choir rehearsals in an empty parking lot during the COVID-19 pandemic to produce a film that speaks to forced separation, but also to unity and resilience during these difficult times.
